028import java.util.LinkedHashMap;

032import java.util.Locale;
033import java.util.Map;
034import java.util.Objects;
035import java.util.Optional;

069/**
070 * Create a new command line parser for parsing of lipid names.
071 *
072 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
073 * @author Nils Hoffmann
074 *
075 */
076public class CmdLineParser {
077
078    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CmdLineParser.class);
079
080    public static final String LIPIDMAPS_CLASS_REGEXP = ".+\\[([A-Z0-9]+)\\]";
081    private static final LipidClasses LIPID_CLASSES = LipidClasses.getInstance();
082
083    private static final Map<Grammar, Parser<LipidAdduct>> parsers = new LinkedHashMap<>();
084
085    private static String getAppInfo() throws IOException {
086        Properties p = new Properties();
087        p.load(CmdLineParser.class.getResourceAsStream(
088                "/application.properties"));
089        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
090        String buildDate = p.getProperty("app.build.date", "no build date");
091        if (!"no build date".equals(buildDate)) {
092            Instant instant = Instant.ofEpochMilli(Long.parseLong(buildDate));
093            buildDate = instant.toString();
094        }
095        /*
096         *Property keys are in src/main/resources/application.properties
097         */
098        sb.append("Running ").
099                append(p.getProperty("app.name", "undefined app")).
100                append("\n\r").
101                append(" version: '").
102                append(p.getProperty("app.version", "unknown version")).
103                append("'").
104                append("\n\r").
105                append(" build-date: '").
106                append(buildDate).
107                append("'").
108                append("\n\r").
109                append(" scm-location: '").
110                append(p.getProperty("scm.location", "no scm location")).
111                append("'").
112                append("\n\r").
113                append(" commit: '").
114                append(p.getProperty("scm.commit.id", "no commit id")).
115                append("'").
116                append("\n\r").
117                append(" branch: '").
118                append(p.getProperty("scm.branch", "no branch")).
119                append("'").
120                append("\n\r");
121        return sb.toString();
122    }
123
124    /**
125     * <p>
126     * Runs the command line parser for jgoslin, including validation.</p>
127     *
128     * Run with the {@code -h} or {@code --help} option to see more options.
129     *
130     * @param args an array of {@link java.lang.String} lipid names.
131     * @throws java.lang.Exception if any unexpected errors occur.
132     */
133    @SuppressWarnings("static-access")
134    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
135        CommandLineParser parser = new PosixParser();
136        Options options = new Options();
137        String helpOpt = addHelpOption(options);
138        String versionOpt = addVersionOption(options);
139        String lipidNameOpt = addLipidNameInputOption(options);
140        String lipidFileOpt = addLipidFileInputOption(options);
141        String outputToFileOpt = addOutputToFileOption(options);
142        String stripWhitespaceOpt = addStripWhitespaceOption(options);
143        String grammarOpt = addGrammarOption(options);
144
145        CommandLine line = parser.parse(options, args);
146        if (line.getOptions().length == 0 || line.hasOption(helpOpt)) {
147            HelpFormatter formatter = new HelpFormatter();
148            formatter.printHelp("jgoslin-cli", options);
149        } else if (line.hasOption(versionOpt)) {
150            log.info(getAppInfo());
151        } else {
152            boolean toFile = false;
153            if (line.hasOption(outputToFileOpt)) {
154                toFile = true;
155            }
156            boolean stripWhitespace = false;
157            if (line.hasOption(stripWhitespaceOpt)) {
158                stripWhitespace = true;
159            }
160            Stream<String> lipidNames = Stream.empty();
161            if (line.hasOption(lipidNameOpt)) {
162                lipidNames = Stream.of(line.getOptionValues(lipidNameOpt));
163            } else if (line.hasOption(lipidFileOpt)) {
164                lipidNames = Files.lines(new File(line.getOptionValue(lipidFileOpt)).toPath()).filter((t) -> {
165                    return !t.isEmpty();
166                });
167            }
168            List<Pair<String, List<ValidationResult>>> results = Collections.emptyList();
169            if (line.hasOption(grammarOpt)) {
170                results = parseNamesWith(lipidNames, Grammar.valueOf(line.getOptionValue(grammarOpt)), stripWhitespace);
171            } else {
172                results = parseNames(lipidNames, stripWhitespace);
173            }
174            if (results.isEmpty()) {
175                log.info("No results generated. Please check input file or lipid names passed on the cli!");
176                System.exit(1);
177            }
178            if (toFile) {
179                log.debug("Saving output to 'goslin-out.tsv'.");
180                boolean successful = writeToFile(new File("goslin-out.tsv"), results);
181                if (!successful) {
182                    System.exit(1);
183                }
184            } else {
185                log.debug("Echoing output to stdout.");
186                boolean successful = writeToStdOut(results);
187                if (!successful) {
188                    System.exit(1);
189                }
190            }
191        }
192    }
193
194    private enum Grammar {
195        GOSLIN, GOSLINFRAGMENTS, LIPIDMAPS, SWISSLIPIDS, HMDB, SHORTHAND2020, FATTYACIDS, NONE
196    };
197
198    record ValidationResult(
199            String lipidName,
200            Grammar grammar,
201            LipidLevel level,
202            List<String> messages,
203            LipidAdduct lipidAdduct,
204            LipidSpeciesInfo lipidSpeciesInfo,
205            String canonicalName,
206            String lipidMapsCategory,
207            String lipidMapsClass,
208            List<FattyAcid> fattyAcids) {
209
210        public ValidationResult          {
211            Objects.requireNonNull(messages);
212            Objects.requireNonNull(fattyAcids);
213        }
214    }
215
216    private static boolean writeToStdOut(List<Pair<String, List<ValidationResult>>> results) {
217
218        try ( StringWriter sw = new StringWriter()) {
219            try ( BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(sw)) {
220                writeToWriter(bw, results);
221            }
222            sw.flush();
223            log.info(sw.toString());
224            return true;
225        } catch (IOException ex) {
226            log.error("Caught exception while trying to write validation results string!", ex);
227            return false;
228        }
229    }
230
231    private static boolean writeToFile(File f, List<Pair<String, List<ValidationResult>>> results) {
232
233        try ( BufferedWriter bw = Files.newBufferedWriter(f.toPath())) {
234            writeToWriter(bw, results);
235            return true;
236        } catch (IOException ex) {
237            log.error("Caught exception while trying to write validation results to file " + f, ex);
238            return false;
239        }
240    }
241    
242    private static void initColumns(Map<String, String> map) {
243        String[] columns = {
244            "Normalized Name",  
245            "Original Name",
246            "Grammar",
247            "Message",
248            "Adduct",
249            "Sum Formula",
250            "Mass",
251            "Lipid Maps Category",
252            "Lipid Maps Main Class",
253            "Functional Class Abbr",
254            "Functional Class Synonyms",
255            "Level",
256            "Total #C",
257            "Total #DB",
258            "Total #OH",
259            "FA1 SN Position",
260            "FA1 #C",
261            "FA1 #DB",
262            "FA1 Bond Type",
263            "FA1 DB Positions",
264            "FA2 SN Position",
265            "FA2 #C",
266            "FA2 #DB",
267            "FA2 Bond Type",
268            "FA2 DB Positions",
269            "FA3 SN Position",
270            "FA3 #C",
271            "FA3 #DB",
272            "FA3 Bond Type",
273            "FA3 DB Positions",
274            "FA4 SN Position",
275            "FA4 #C",
276            "FA4 #DB",
277            "FA4 Bond Type",
278            "FA4 DB Positions",
279            "LCB SN Position",
280            "LCB #C",
281            "LCB #DB",
282            "LCB Bond Type",
283            "LCB DB Positions",
284            "Lipid Shorthand CATEGORY",
285            "Lipid Shorthand CLASS",
286            "Lipid Shorthand SPECIES",
287            "Lipid Shorthand MOLECULAR_SPECIES",
288            "Lipid Shorthand SN_POSITION",
289            "Lipid Shorthand STRUCTURE_DEFINED",
290            "Lipid Shorthand FULL_STRUCTURE",
291            "Lipid Shorthand COMPLETE_STRUCTURE"
292        };
293        Arrays.asList(columns).stream().forEach((t) -> {
294            map.put(t, "");
295        });
296    }
297
298    private static String toTable(List<Pair<String, List<ValidationResult>>> results) {
299        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
300        HashSet<String> keys = new LinkedHashSet<>();
301        List<ValidationResult> validationResults = results.stream().map((t) -> {
302            return t.getValue();
303        }).flatMap(List::stream).toList();
304        List<Map<String, String>> entries = validationResults.stream().map((t) -> {
305            Map<String, String> m = new LinkedHashMap<>();
306            initColumns(m);
307            m.put("Normalized Name", Optional.ofNullable(t.canonicalName).orElse(""));
308            m.put("Original Name", t.lipidName);
309            m.put("Grammar", t.grammar.name());
310            m.put("Message", t.messages.stream().collect(Collectors.joining(" | ")));
311            if (t.lipidAdduct != null) {
312                m.put("Adduct", t.lipidAdduct.getAdduct() == null ? "" : t.lipidAdduct.getAdduct().getLipidString());
313                try {
314                    m.put("Sum Formula", t.lipidAdduct.getSumFormula());
315                } catch (ConstraintViolationException | NullPointerException cve) {
316                    log.debug("Could not calculate sum formula for lipid {}", t.lipidName);
317                    log.error("Exception:", cve);
318                    m.put("Sum Formula", "");
319                }
320                try {
321                    m.put("Mass", String.format(Locale.US, "%.4f", t.lipidAdduct.getMass()));
322                } catch (ConstraintViolationException | NullPointerException cve) {
323                    log.debug("Could not calculate mass for lipid {}", t.lipidName);
324                    log.error("Exception:", cve);
325                    m.put("Mass", "");
326                }
327                m.put("Lipid Maps Category", t.lipidAdduct.getLipid().getHeadGroup().getLipidCategory().getFullName() + " [" + t.lipidAdduct.getLipid().getHeadGroup().getLipidCategory().name() + "]");
328                LipidClassMeta lclass = LIPID_CLASSES.get(t.lipidAdduct.getLipid().getInfo().lipidClass);
329                m.put("Lipid Maps Main Class", lclass.description);
330                String lclassAbbr = getLipidMapsClassAbbreviation(lclass.description);
331                m.put("Functional Class Abbr", lclassAbbr);
332                m.put("Functional Class Synonyms", "[" + lclass.synonyms.stream().collect(Collectors.joining(", ")) + "]");
333                m.put("Level", t.level.name());
334                m.put("Total #C", t.lipidSpeciesInfo.getNumCarbon() + "");
335                m.put("Total #DB", t.lipidSpeciesInfo.getDoubleBonds().getNumDoubleBonds() + "");
336                Map<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> functionalGroups = t.lipidSpeciesInfo.getFunctionalGroups();
337                for (String functionalGroupKey : functionalGroups.keySet()) {
338                    ArrayList<FunctionalGroup> fg = functionalGroups.get(functionalGroupKey);
339                    String fgCounts = fg.stream().map((sfg) -> {
340                        return "" + sfg.getCount();
341                    }).collect(Collectors.joining("|"));
342                    m.put("Total #" + functionalGroupKey, fgCounts);
343                }
344                for (FattyAcid fa : t.fattyAcids()) {
345                    String faName = fa.getName();
346                    m.put(faName + " SN Position", fa.getPosition() + "");
347                    m.put(faName + " #C", fa.getNumCarbon() + "");
348                    m.put(faName + " #DB", fa.getDoubleBonds().getNumDoubleBonds() + "");
349                    m.put(faName + " Bond Type", fa.getLipidFaBondType().name() + "");
350                    String dbPositions = fa.getDoubleBonds().getDoubleBondPositions().entrySet().stream().map((entry) -> {
351                        return entry.getKey() + "" + entry.getValue();
352                    }).collect(Collectors.joining("|"));
353                    m.put(faName + " DB Positions", dbPositions + "");
354                    for (String functionalGroupKey : fa.getFunctionalGroups().keySet()) {
355                        ArrayList<FunctionalGroup> fg = fa.getFunctionalGroups().get(functionalGroupKey);
356                        String fgCounts = fg.stream().map((sfg) -> {
357                            return "" + sfg.getCount();
358                        }).collect(Collectors.joining("|"));
359                        m.put("Total #" + functionalGroupKey, fgCounts);
360                    }
361                }
362                m.put("Lipid Shorthand " + LipidLevel.CATEGORY.name(), nameForLevel(t.lipidAdduct, LipidLevel.CATEGORY));
363                m.put("Lipid Shorthand " + LipidLevel.CLASS.name(), nameForLevel(t.lipidAdduct, LipidLevel.CLASS));
364                m.put("Lipid Shorthand " + LipidLevel.SPECIES.name(), nameForLevel(t.lipidAdduct, LipidLevel.SPECIES));
365                m.put("Lipid Shorthand " + LipidLevel.MOLECULAR_SPECIES.name(), nameForLevel(t.lipidAdduct, LipidLevel.MOLECULAR_SPECIES));
366                m.put("Lipid Shorthand " + LipidLevel.SN_POSITION.name(), nameForLevel(t.lipidAdduct, LipidLevel.SN_POSITION));
367                m.put("Lipid Shorthand " + LipidLevel.STRUCTURE_DEFINED.name(), nameForLevel(t.lipidAdduct, LipidLevel.STRUCTURE_DEFINED));
368                m.put("Lipid Shorthand " + LipidLevel.FULL_STRUCTURE.name(), nameForLevel(t.lipidAdduct, LipidLevel.FULL_STRUCTURE));
369                m.put("Lipid Shorthand " + LipidLevel.COMPLETE_STRUCTURE.name(), nameForLevel(t.lipidAdduct, LipidLevel.COMPLETE_STRUCTURE));
370//            } else {
371//                m.put("Lipid Maps Category", "");
372//                m.put("Lipid Maps Main Class", "");
373//                m.put("Functional Class Abbr", "");
374//                m.put("Functional Class Synonyms", "");
375//                m.put("Level", "");
376//                m.put("Total #C", "");
377//                m.put("Total #DB", "");
378            }
379            keys.addAll(m.keySet());
380            return m;
381        }).toList();
382        sb.append(keys.stream().collect(Collectors.joining("\t"))).append("\n");
383        for (Map<String, String> m : entries) {
384            List<String> l = new LinkedList();
385            for (String key : keys) {
386                l.add(m.getOrDefault(key, ""));
387            }
388            sb.append(l.stream().collect(Collectors.joining("\t"))).append("\n");
389        }
390        return sb.toString();
391    }
392
393    private static String nameForLevel(LipidAdduct la, LipidLevel level) {
394        if (level.level <= la.getLipidLevel().level) {
395            return la.getLipidString(level);
396        }
397        return "";
398    }
399
400    private static void writeToWriter(BufferedWriter bw, List<Pair<String, List<ValidationResult>>> results) {
401        try {
402            bw.write(toTable(results));
403            bw.newLine();
404        } catch (IOException ex) {
405            log.error("Caught exception while trying to write validation results to buffered writer.", ex);
406        }
407    }
408
409    private static List<Pair<String, List<ValidationResult>>> parseNames(Stream<String> lipidNames, boolean stripWhitespace) {
410        LipidParser lipidParser = new LipidParser();
411        return lipidNames.map((t) -> {
412            return parseName(stripWhitespace ? t.strip() : t, lipidParser);
413        }).toList().stream().map((t) -> {
414            return Pair.of(t.getKey(), Arrays.asList(t.getValue()));
415        }).toList();
416    }
417
418    private static List<Pair<String, List<ValidationResult>>> parseNamesWith(Stream<String> lipidNames, Grammar grammar, boolean stripWhitespace) {
419        return lipidNames.map((t) -> {
420            return parseNameWith(stripWhitespace ? t.strip() : t, grammar);
421        }).toList().stream().map((t) -> {
422            return Pair.of(t.getKey(), Arrays.asList(t.getValue()));
423        }).toList();
424    }
425
426    private static Pair<String, ValidationResult> parseNameWith(String lipidName, Grammar grammar) {
427        Parser<LipidAdduct> parser = loadParsers().get(grammar);
428        if (parser == null) {
429            throw new ConstraintViolationException("Unsupported grammar: " + grammar);
430        }
431        ValidationResult validationResult;
432        try {
433            BaseParserEventHandler<LipidAdduct> handler = parser.newEventHandler();
434            LipidAdduct la = parser.parse(lipidName, handler, false);
435            if (la == null) {
436                validationResult = new ValidationResult(
437                        lipidName,
438                        grammar,
439                        LipidLevel.NO_LEVEL,
440                        Arrays.asList(handler.getErrorMessage()),
441                        null,
442                        null,
443                        null,
444                        null,
445                        null,
446                        Collections.emptyList()
447                );
448                log.debug("Could not parse " + lipidName + " with " + grammar + " grammar: " + grammar + ". Message: " + handler.getErrorMessage());
449                return Pair.of(lipidName, validationResult);
450            } else {
451                String canonicalName;
452                try {
453                    canonicalName = la.getLipidString();
454                } catch (RuntimeException re) {
455                    canonicalName = null;
456                    log.debug("Parsing error for {}!", lipidName);
457                }
458                List<FattyAcid> fas = extractFas(la);
459                validationResult = new ValidationResult(
460                        lipidName,
461                        grammar,
462                        la.getLipidLevel(),
463                        Arrays.asList(handler.getErrorMessage()),
464                        la,
465                        la.getLipid().getInfo(),
466                        canonicalName,
467                        LIPID_CLASSES.get(la.getLipid().getInfo().lipidClass).lipidCategory.name(),
468                        getLipidMapsClassAbbreviation(LIPID_CLASSES.get(la.getLipid().getInfo().lipidClass).lipidClassName),
469                        fas
470                );
471                return Pair.of(lipidName, validationResult);
472            }
473        } catch (LipidException ex) {
474            validationResult = new ValidationResult(
475                    lipidName,
476                    grammar,
477                    LipidLevel.NO_LEVEL,
478                    Arrays.asList("Parsing failed for lipid '" + lipidName + "' using grammar '" + grammar + "' with exception: " + ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
479                    null,
480                    null,
481                    null,
482                    null,
483                    null,
484                    Collections.emptyList()
485            );
486            log.error("Parsing failed for lipid '" + lipidName + "' using grammar '" + grammar + "' with exception: " + ex.getLocalizedMessage(), ex);
487            return Pair.of(lipidName, validationResult);
488        }
489    }
490
491    private static Pair<String, ValidationResult> parseName(String lipidName, LipidParser parser) {
492        Pair<String, ValidationResult> shorthandResult = null;
493        ValidationResult validationResult;
494        try {
495            LipidAdduct la = parser.parse(lipidName);
496            String canonicalName;
497            try {
498                canonicalName = la.getLipidString();
499            } catch (RuntimeException re) {
500                canonicalName = null;
501                log.debug("Parsing error for {}!", lipidName);
502            }
503            List<FattyAcid> fas = extractFas(la);
504            validationResult = new ValidationResult(
505                    lipidName,
506                    Grammar.valueOf(parser.getLastSuccessfulGrammar().toUpperCase()),
507                    la.getLipidLevel(),
508                    Arrays.asList(""),
509                    la,
510                    la.getLipid().getInfo(),
511                    canonicalName,
512                    LIPID_CLASSES.get(la.getLipid().getInfo().lipidClass).lipidCategory.name(),
513                    getLipidMapsClassAbbreviation(LIPID_CLASSES.get(la.getLipid().getInfo().lipidClass).lipidClassName),
514                    fas
515            );
516            shorthandResult = Pair.of(lipidName, validationResult);
517        } catch (LipidException ex) {
518            validationResult = new ValidationResult(
519                    lipidName,
520                    Grammar.NONE,
521                    LipidLevel.NO_LEVEL,
522                    Arrays.asList(ex.getMessage()),
523                    null,
524                    null,
525                    null,
526                    null,
527                    null,
528                    Collections.emptyList()
529            );
530            log.debug("Could not parse " + lipidName + " with any grammar. Message: " + ex.getMessage());
531            shorthandResult = Pair.of(lipidName, validationResult);
532        }
533        return shorthandResult;
534    }
535
536    private static ArrayList<FattyAcid> extractFas(LipidAdduct la) {
537        return la.getLipid().getFaList();
538    }
539
540    private static String getLipidMapsClassAbbreviation(String lipidMapsClass) {
541        Pattern lmcRegexp = Pattern.compile(LIPIDMAPS_CLASS_REGEXP);
542        Matcher lmcMatcher = lmcRegexp.matcher(lipidMapsClass);
543        if (lmcMatcher.matches() && lmcMatcher.groupCount() == 1) {
544            return "[" + lmcMatcher.group(1) + "]";
545        }
546        return "";
547    }
548
549    protected static String addLipidFileInputOption(Options options) {
550        String versionOpt = "file";
551        options.addOption("f", versionOpt, true, "Input a file name to read from for lipid name for parsing. Each lipid name must be on a separate line.");
552        return versionOpt;
553    }
554
555    protected static String addLipidNameInputOption(Options options) {
556        String versionOpt = "name";
557        options.addOption("n", versionOpt, true, "Input a lipid name for parsing.");
558        return versionOpt;
559    }
560
561    protected static String addVersionOption(Options options) {
562        String versionOpt = "version";
563        options.addOption("v", versionOpt, false, "Print version information.");
564        return versionOpt;
565    }
566
567    protected static String addHelpOption(Options options) {
568        String helpOpt = "help";
569        options.addOption("h", helpOpt, false, "Print help message.");
570        return helpOpt;
571    }
572
573    protected static String addOutputToFileOption(Options options) {
574        String outputToFileOpt = "outputFile";
575        options.addOption("o", outputToFileOpt, false, "Write output to file 'goslin-out.tsv' instead of to std out.");
576        return outputToFileOpt;
577    }
578
579    protected static String addStripWhitespaceOption(Options options) {
580        String stripWhitespaceOpt = "stripWhitespace";
581        options.addOption("w", stripWhitespaceOpt, false, "Strip leading and trailing whitespace of names passed to goslin. Be aware that original names in output will contain the stripped names!");
582        return stripWhitespaceOpt;
583    }
584
585    protected static String addGrammarOption(Options options) {
586        String grammarOpt = "grammar";
587        options.addOption("g", grammarOpt, true, "Use the provided grammar explicitly instead of all grammars. Options are: " + Arrays.toString(Grammar.values()));
588        return grammarOpt;
589    }
590
591    private static Map<Grammar, Parser<LipidAdduct>> loadParsers() {
592        if (parsers.isEmpty()) {
593            KnownFunctionalGroups kfg = new KnownFunctionalGroups();
594            for (Grammar grammar : Grammar.values()) {
595                switch (grammar) {
596                    case FATTYACIDS ->
597                        parsers.put(grammar, new FattyAcidParser(kfg));
598                    case GOSLIN ->
599                        parsers.put(grammar, new GoslinParser(kfg));
600                    case HMDB ->
601                        parsers.put(grammar, new HmdbParser(kfg));
602                    case LIPIDMAPS ->
603                        parsers.put(grammar, new LipidMapsParser(kfg));
604                    case SHORTHAND2020 ->
605                        parsers.put(grammar, new ShorthandParser(kfg));
606                    case SWISSLIPIDS ->
607                        parsers.put(grammar, new SwissLipidsParser(kfg));
608                    case GOSLINFRAGMENTS -> {
609                    }
610                    case NONE -> {
611                    }
612                }
613            }
614        }
615        return parsers;
616    }
617
618}
